WRITING.TITLE: Is there a hidden bar/restaurant that has no crowded line ?
WRITING.TEXT: Me and my friends would like to go to one of the secret bars/restaurants behind a vending machine/telephone booth etc. But I'm reading that most of them have crowded lines in front of them and need reservations, I'm fine with a reservation but I don't like the fact that there would be a line, not very secret you know!
"Will get you in as many extreme situations as possible"

WRITING.TITLE: Need a Toad King, help me find one!
WRITING.TEXT: As the title says, conversion products are also appreciated (Meaning a toad and king stuff). It would be used in an 28mm boardgame called Talisman.
Are you able to turn the ship any way you like?

WRITING.TITLE: Magnetizing the U-wing, M or L magnets?
WRITING.TEXT: I've been magnetizing my ships today but I'm not sure which magnet I should use on the U-wing. It's a large ship but it weighs nothing, should I use a Medium or Large bearing ? (Using those from Greenstuff World)
